explains: adj. 弥赛亚的；救世主似的

sentences.en: The cult leader saw himself as a messianic figure.
sentences.cn: 该邪教领袖把自己看做一位救世人物。

sentences.en: The reforms were carried out with an almost messianic zeal.
sentences.cn: 改革是以极大的热情进行的。

sentences.en: The book proved such a success that the authors followed it up with "The Messianic Legacy."
sentences.cn: 该书获得了如此大的成功，以至作者随后又出了一本《天主的遗产》。
